nodes.text: Gun Nut was a mini-adventure for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game that was added to Wizards.com on April 11 2002. It was written by Jeff Quick.

The players are on the planet Trevura during the Galactic Civil War, when they are attacked by stormtroopers testing a new type of blaster. They later aided the assassin droid S-R6, who had been hired to kill Imperial Governor Merno Blask.
